text: Ichikawa Raizō (, 29 August 1931 - 17 July 1969), also called Ichikawa Raizō VIII (), was a Japanese movie actor, kabuki actor, and television actor. ==Other websites== * *JMDb profile Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese dancers Category:1931 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Kyoto Prefecture
title: Ichikawa Raizō VIII
